refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: gwsvcctl is a simple remote frontend to the Windows srvsvc service. This service allows restarting, stop and starting remote services.

refsect1.title: VERSION
refsect1.para: This man page is correct for version 4.0 of the Samba suite.

refsect1.title: AUTHOR
refsect1.para: This utility is part of the Samba suite, which is developed by the global Samba Team.
This manpage and gwsvcctl were written by Jelmer Vernooij.
